objects.text:
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Intuitive Dial Controls
• High-Performance Autofocus
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Premium Mirrorless Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design with durable black finish
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with XF mount compatibility
• Premium build quality with intuitive dial controls for manual settings
• High-performance autofocus system for precise shooting
• Electronic viewfinder for real-time image preview
• Multiple creative shooting modes and film simulation options
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive range of XF lenses
• Ideal for both beginners and experienced photographers
• Real-time manual exposure controls with dedicated dials

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern and professional promotional layout for a premium camera product. The composition balances informative content with strong visual hierarchy. A high-impact title labeled by **“heading”** and **“subheading”** introduces the product boldly at the top-left, accompanied by a smaller **“tagline”** directly below, reinforcing the product's positioning. A prominent **“product_image”** occupies the right side, cropped for dramatic focus on the camera lens. Below, the **“description”** lists primary features in bullet format followed by a large **“price”** display. A vibrant red **“cta_background”** rectangle supports the white **“cta”** text for a clear call-to-action. The dark background is subtly segmented with a grid and minimal line elements to offer structure while maintaining visual clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#1A1A1A)
- Charcoal Gray (#252525/#303030)
- Red Highlight (#FF3333)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
- Soft Gray Text (#E0E0E0)
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly in sleek matte black, projecting a professional and sophisticated look. The primary color is a deep black (#0B0B0B), used generously across the body to emphasize strength and durability. Accents of metallic silver (#D3D3D3) on the dials, along with glossy lens reflections embedding hints of emerald green (#7FFFD4), amber gold (#FFD700), and cyan (#00FFFF), subtly draw attention to key features. The white (#FFFFFF) branding and labels contrast crisply, making text pop for readability. Blending matte and gloss textures enhances visual depth, making it ideal for a premium, high-contrast advertisement banner.
